metadata.title: CVE-2017-7578 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in parser.c in libming 0.4.7 allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (listswf application crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted SWF file. NOTE:this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9831.

criterions.comment: ming package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
